messages.title: Local Success
messages.content: I am supporting David because of the fantastic job he did in getting the Dunsar War Memorial listed and protected from developers. On a personal level, he also helped me get my late husband's name memorialised. - Jean Stroud Mount Resident, Bromley Cross Resident

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Free TV Licences, Rail Travel and Bus Travel
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I promise to continue the fight to get the free TV licence extended to all over the age of 60 and I promise to continue my fight for improved Rail and Bus services in Bolton.
I promise to oppose the closure of any children's centres in Bolton North East. Thereby ensuring the continued support and activities for the families and children of Bolton.
I promise to ensure that the funding for the Royal Bolton Hospital and a new Baby Super Centre of Excellence is not cut.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have a proven track record as an independently minded MP with experience and drive, who has represented the people of Bolton since 1997.

politicalExperience.achievements: I fought successfully to ensure the Bolton Institute gained University Status.
I have defended the right for the people of Bolton to choose if they want fluoride added to their water.
In the interests of my constituents, I campaigned against a Congestion Charge for Greater Manchester.
I lobbied successfully to ensure the Post Office Card Account was retained by the Post Office.
I am proud to say I voted to end the barbaric practice of fox hunting.

endorsements.endorsement: I am supporting David because of the fantastic job he did in getting the Dunsar War Memorial listed and protected from developers. On a personal level, he also helped me get my late husband's name memorialised.
